channel.title: CVE Feed for Motorola -- MR2600 Router
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Motorola -- MR2600 Router

item.title: CVE-2022-3681|2024-08-03T01:14:03.263Z -- motorola -- mr2600%20router
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in the MR2600 router v1.0.18 and earlier that could allow an attacker within range of the wireless network to successfully brute force the WPS pin, potentially allowing them unauthorized access to a wireless network.

item.title: CVE-2022-34885|2024-08-03T09:22:10.730Z -- motorola -- mr2600%20router
item.description: An improper input sanitization vulnerability in the Motorola MR2600 router could allow a local user with elevated permissions to execute arbitrary code.
